item.title: Key Learning from Apple's Product Development Process
item.description:
Key Learning from Apple's Product Development Process

On reporting and communication with other teams, they create their own reporting structures; The Apple New Product Process (ANPP) and give to a product development team when they begin work with details every stage of the design process.

item.title: Softbank Personal Innovation - Analog Innovation
item.description:
Softbank Personal Innovation - Analog Innovation

Does technology adapt itself to support you or you have to adjust yourself to support technology? Softbank a Japanese business megalith creates a touchy campaign to remind us how should technology work to support our life, especially elder life. It is not the elderly do not... #softbank #uxdesign

item.title: Refrigerator that cools without electricity
item.description:
Refrigerator that cools without electricity

Have you ever start doing something even it seems to be impossible in the first place? Sri Mansukhbhai R. Prajapati, a high school dropout from India has created something that none of us ever start to think that it is possible, a refrigerator that cools without electricity. This... #unification

item.title: How often do you redesign your superstar?
item.description:
How often do you redesign your superstar?

Everyone are comforted to have a feeling of under control zone. Yes, It gives us peaceful mind. But in the business context, can we have a rest time, especially under this era of hyper-compressed competition. Kava: Google Redesigns Data Center Cooling Every 12 to 18 Months | Data Center...

item.title: Nest's Biggest Problem Wasn't Tony Fadell
item.description:
Nest's Biggest Problem Wasn't Tony Fadell

One big challenge on innovation in Technology field is how to deliver such technology at a right price at the right time. In the past, there are many countless examples of technology innovation failed before market become mass enough to survive. Nest is a hot product in Home... #mit #nestlabs

item.title: Breakthroughs in Bakery
item.description:
Breakthroughs in Bakery

item.title: Meatball Manufacturing
item.description:
Meatball Manufacturing

Our client was looking for optimization potential in the industrial manufacturing process of meatballs - famously known for meatball supplier at IKEA restaurants. Basically in the production process, meatball makes by very simple steps like. 1. Chop the meat into pieces 2. Ground piece of meat Each of the steps is fully automated like this in everywhere.
